title: Microsoft Teams: Call Health Panel for VDI
description:
The Call health view in Teams helps you identify
and troubleshoot issues you might experience during a Teams meeting or call. In
this view you will get data on your network, audio, screen sharing, and
outgoing video quality. These real-time metrics are updated every 15 seconds
and are best used to troubleshoot issues that last for at least that long. To
view your stats during a call or meeting, select More actions icon at the top
of the call window, and then select Call health near the top of the menu.
